languages.text:
Я умираю у ног Жертвы... нет. У ног мон-кай. Унизительный конец для того, кто мучительными изменениями плоти и кровавым паломничеством на самый верх шпилей заслужил статус совершенного Охотника Комморры.
Обидно ли так умирать? Да.
Справедливо ли? Конечно.

I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.
languages.original_text:

Обидно ли так умирать? Да.
Справедливо ли? Конечно.

languages.text:
私は獲物…いや、モン＝ケイの足元で死につつある。拷問のような肉体の改造と、尖塔の頂上への血塗られた巡礼によってコモラフの頂点に立つハンターの地位を得た者の、屈辱的な最期である。
非業の死は…そう、痛く苦しい。
だが受け入れよう。
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

traits.locale_text:
私は獲物…いや、モン＝ケイの足元で死につつある。拷問のような肉体の改造と、尖塔の頂上への血塗られた巡礼によってコモラフの頂点に立つハンターの地位を得た者の、屈辱的な最期である。
非業の死は…そう、痛く苦しい。
だが受け入れよう。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
我死在了猎物的脚下……不，我死在了猴子的脚下。我是整个科摩罗最顶尖的猎物，我通过痛苦的肉体改造，以及尖塔塔顶的血腥朝圣，才赢得了这样的地位。这样的结局对我而言，实在是再耻辱不过了。
这样的死法痛苦吗？是啊，很痛苦。
这公平吗？是啊，也很公平。
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

traits.locale_text:

这样的死法痛苦吗？是啊，很痛苦。
这公平吗？是啊，也很公平。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Muero a los pies de mi presa... no, a los pies de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. Un final humillante después de haberme ganado el puesto de cazador supremo de Commorragh mediante atroces alteraciones de la carne y un peregrinaje sangriento a la cima de las agujas.
¿Duele morir así? Desde luego.
¿Es justo? Lo es.
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

traits.locale_text:
Muero a los pies de mi presa... no, a los pies de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. Un final humillante después de haberme ganado el puesto de cazador supremo de Commorragh mediante atroces alteraciones de la carne y un peregrinaje sangriento a la cima de las agujas.
¿Duele morir así? Desde luego.
¿Es justo? Lo es.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Ich sterbe vor den Füßen meiner Beute ... nein, vor den Füßen eines Chem-Pan-Sey. Ein erniedrigendes Ende für ein Wesen, das sich den Status des stärksten Hunters von Commorragh erkämpft hatte, durch qualvolle Veränderungen des Fleischs und eine blutige Pilgerreise an die Spitze der Türme.
Tut es weh, so zu verenden? Ja.
Ist es gerecht? Ja.
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

Tut es weh, so zu verenden? Ja.
Ist es gerecht? Ja.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Je meurs aux pieds de ma proie... non, aux pieds d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh. Qui aurait pu imaginer fin plus humiliante pour le meilleur chasseur de Commorragh, celui-là même qui a subi les affres des altérations de la chair et qui a survécu au pèlerinage sanglant vers le sommet des tours.
Est-ce douloureux de mourir ainsi ? Oui.
Est-ce juste ? Oui.
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

languages.text:
Avımın... Hayır, bir mon-keigh'in ayaklarının dibinde ölüyorum. Bedeni azap dolu operasyonlarla değişikliğe uğrayan, kulelerin en tepesine kanlı bir hac yolculuğu yapan ve bunlar sayesinde Commorragh'ın apeks Avcısı statüsünü kazanan biri için küçük düşürücü bir son.
Bu şekilde yok olmak içimi acıtıyor mu? Acıtıyor.
Adil mi? Adil.
languages.original_text:
I am dying at the feet of my Prey... no, at the feet of a mon-keigh. A humiliating end for one who earned the status of apex Hunter of Commorragh through torturous alterations of the flesh and a bloody pilgrimage to the very top of the spires.
Does it hurt to perish like this? It does.
Is it fair? It is.

traits.locale_text:
Av'ımın ayaklarının dibinde ölüyorum. Hayır, bir mon-keigh'in ayaklarının dibinde. Bedeni azap dolu operasyonlarla geliştirilen, kulelerin en tepesine kanlı bir hac yolculuğu yapan ve bunlar sayesinde Commorragh'ın apeks Avcı'sı statüsünü kazanan biri için küçük düşürücü bir son.
Bu şekilde yok olmak içimi acıtıyor mu? Acıtıyor.
Adil mi? Adil.
traits.speaker: Player
